text:
Hi all. I was wondering if there was a nice example of how to use the `quiver()` series type and scale the vectors by the width of the window like matplotlib does. There exists an issue on GitHub about it as well
<https://github.com/JuliaPlots/Plots.jl/issues/2925>

The functionality is supported by the backend, it just needs an interface from the `quiver()` function. I'd appreciate any help, thanks!
